title: Department of Social Work and Sociology  · Angelo State University
description: Take the next step in your social work or sociology career with Angelo State’s Department of Social Work and Sociology. Apply today and make a difference.

headings: Social Work Prof Re-Elected to National Standards Board, Sep 12
First Social Work Doctoral Graduates to Raise Angelo State’s National Profile, Aug 7
I Am Angelo: Felicia Garcia, Oct 5
paragraphs: Social work is a healthcare profession that assists clients in improving their social, psychosocial or biopsychosocial functioning. Sociology is a social science that focuses on the study of social behavior and social organization.

In our social work program, you will learn the skills and values needed to engage in competent and ethical social work practice. In our sociology program, you will gain real-world knowledge and skills that will prepare you for a wide variety of career fields.
Refer to theUndergraduate Catalogfor a full list of Minors and their requirements.
Our B.S.W. and M.S.W. degrees have been ranked in the Best Online Bachelor’s Degrees in Social Work and Best Online Master’s in Social Work for 2024 by EduMed.org.
ASU has been selected as one of the best schools in Texas for an online M.S.W. degree byOnlineU.
Our B.S.W. and M.S.W. degrees are accredited by theCouncil on Social Work Education’s Board of Accreditation.
Our D.S.W. in Clinical Social Work degree is a MEMBER of theGroup for the Advancement of Doctoral Education in Social Work(GADE).
Sep 12
Aug 7
Angelo State is helping Felicia Garcia fulfill her calling to help others.

Both social work and sociology careers offer you the opportunity to improve lives. Your ASU degree is your ticket to join a dynamic group of professionals who work to restore or enhance the social, psychosocial or bio-psychosocial functioning of individuals, couples, families, groups, organizations or communities in a variety of settings.
Take a look at some other aspects of our department that make ASU an outstanding place to pursue your degree in social work or sociology.
Gain valuable experience and develop your professional network before you graduate. Social work interns take on a case load and work with real clients.

Earn your degree in social work right where you are! Our partnership with San Antonio College (SAC) is designed to help you achieve your educational goals. You’ll have the opportunity to take upper-level social work courses face-to-face on the SAC campus taught by ASU faculty. You also have the option of completing your ASU bachelor’s degree 100% online.

Join our Student Social Work Association, the Phi Alpha social work honor society, our Student Sociological Association, and/or the Alpha Kappa Delta sociology honor society. They provide opportunities for professional development, networking, philanthropy and social events as you really get to know your fellow students and professors.

Participate in our annual summer study abroad program where you’ll travel across Europe. Visit partner universities in the Netherlands, meet with professionals in the Czech Republic, and work with the Ronald McDonald Foundation in Bucharest, Romania.
